# cyctl serve

Start the Cyclops UI

### Synopsis

Start the Cyclops UI by forwarding the Cyclops UI service's port to a local port

```
cyctl serve -port [port] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help       help for serve
  -p, --port int   local port to forward to (default 3000)
```
